# jumpToBookmark(_:)

**Instance Method**

Restores game to the given bookmark

## Declaration

```swift
func jumpToBookmark(_ bookmark: StateBookmark)
```

## Jumping to bookmarks

- **jumpToBookmark(matching:)**: Restores game to the given bookmark
